title: Turning the lights on at the time of Maghrib and not going to the washroom while Azaan is going on!
transcript: F Shan says I live in Pakistan and we have one thing common that before the advent of Madrid we turned the lights off and we do not go to the bathroom during the Adhan this is totally baseless and has no foundation in Islam on none whatsoever this is all superstitious ideas that people brought some from here there but it's not related to Islam go to the bathroom your lights are on if you're in the home keep them on there is no problem even between Maghrib and Isha keep them on
